00027 #include <Inventor/events/SoButtonEvent.h>
00028 
00029 #define SO_MOUSE_PRESS_EVENT(EVENT, BUTTON) \
00030  (SoMouseButtonEvent::isButtonPressEvent(EVENT, SoMouseButtonEvent::BUTTON))
00031 
00032 #define SO_MOUSE_RELEASE_EVENT(EVENT, BUTTON) \
00033  (SoMouseButtonEvent::isButtonReleaseEvent(EVENT, SoMouseButtonEvent::BUTTON))
00034 
00035 class COIN_DLL_API SoMouseButtonEvent : public SoButtonEvent {
00036   typedef SoButtonEvent inherited;
00037 
00038   SO_EVENT_HEADER();
00039 
00040 public:
00041   enum Button {
00042     ANY, BUTTON1, BUTTON2, BUTTON3, BUTTON4, BUTTON5
00043   };
00044 
00045   SoMouseButtonEvent(void);
00046   virtual ~SoMouseButtonEvent();
00047 
00048   void setButton(SoMouseButtonEvent::Button button);
00049   SoMouseButtonEvent::Button getButton(void) const;
00050 
00051   static SbBool isButtonPressEvent(const SoEvent * e,
00052                                    SoMouseButtonEvent::Button whichButton);
00053   static SbBool isButtonReleaseEvent(const SoEvent * e,
00054                                      SoMouseButtonEvent::Button whichButton);
00055 
00056   static void initClass(void);
00057 
00058 private:
00059   Button button;
00060 };
00061 
00062 #endif // !COIN_SOMOUSEBUTTONEVENT_H
